author: Special Correspondent
text:
M. Vaiammal (31), wife of anchor-comedian and ‘Sun TV’ fame Muthu alias Muthu Irulandi, was killed on Thursday when the car in which she was travelling hit a roadside tree.

Police said that she was on her way from Thanakkankulam in Madurai in an SUV to offer worship at Pillayarpatti Vinayagar temple when the driver lost control of the vehicle after a tyre burst, and dashed the vehicle against a tamarind tree.

Vaiammal, a housewife, died on the spot. Kannan, a family friend who was at the wheel, suffered serious injuries and has been admitted to a private hospital in Madurai after being given first aid at the local Government Hospital, the police said.

Muthu anchored ‘Asathapovathu Yaru’ and ‘Sunday Special’ in the satellite television channel.
title: Television anchor’s wife dies in accident
